title: Gen. Mattis: Trump is 'Threat to the Constitution'
summary: Revered Defense Secretary Gen. James 'Mad Dog' Mattis called Trump a 'threat to the Constitution' and said Trump 'does not try to unite the American people.' So worried about nuclear strike he slept in gym clothes for emergency calls.
